original: 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams so //
translated: from this come the arhats;

original: 'di las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: from this come the pratyekabuddhas;

original: 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: from this come the bodhisattvas;

original: 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te /
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te /
translated: from this come the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: They have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te /
translated: and all of them have relied upon this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: They have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain manifestly perfect buddhahood,🔽and are attaining manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bsgom pa dang /🔽tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @112b pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bsgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @112b pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: Subhūti, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly awakened Buddha always and continuously sees with his buddha-eye and thinks of all those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who write out, read aloud, clearly articulate, and contemplate this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom, and who properly pay attention to it.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni /
translated: Subhūti, those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba mdzad do //
translated: The Tathagatas, the Arhats, the Perfectly accomplished Buddhas are always and uninterruptedly guarded so that they do not fall away from their unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhuti:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa'o //
translated: The Lord has said that the perfection of wisdom is the producer of the Tathagatas,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten ston pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten ston pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa /
translated: the teacher of the world with its gods, men and Asuras.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,🔽how does the perfection of wisdom produce the Tathagatas,

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa lags /
translated: the Arhats, the Perfectly accomplished Buddhas?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'jig rten ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'jig rten ston pa lags /
translated: How does the perfection of wisdom show the world?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun pa lags /
translated: how does the perfection of wisdom give rise to the Tathāgata?

original: 'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la gsungs /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang la gsungs /
translated: To whom did the Tathāgata teach the world?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed do //
translated: “Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom gives rise to the ten powers of the Tathāgata,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed do //🔽so so @113a *//
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed do // so so @113a *//
translated: gives rise to the four fearlessnesses,

original: yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed do //🔽byams pa chen po bskyed do //
analyzed: yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed do // byams pa chen po bskyed do //
translated: gives rise to the four kinds of exact knowledge,🔽gives rise to great love,

original: snying rje chen po bskyed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po bskyed do //
translated: gives rise to great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed do //
translated: gives rise to the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid bskyed do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid bskyed do //
translated: gives rise to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed do //
translated: gives rise to the knowledge of the aspects of the path,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskyed do //
translated: and gives rise to omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / chos de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs par brjod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs par brjod de /
translated: Subhuti: By these dharmas is the Tathagata to be seen.

original: rab 'byor / de bas rga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed do //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas rga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed do // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhuti: Therefore this deep perfection of wisdom has generated the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'jig rten gang lags //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'jig rten gang lags // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord: What is the world as taught by the Tathagata?

original: rab 'byor / phung po ldan de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / phung po ldan de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so //
translated: The Lord: The five grasping skandhas, Subhuti, have been taught by the Tathagata as the world.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga ni ji ltar bstan pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'di dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga ni ji ltar bstan pa lags / bcom ldan 'das / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'di dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin /
translated: The Lord: How do you, Subhuti, understand the five grasping skandhas to be taught by the perfection of wisdom?

original: rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te /
translated: The Lord: The perfection of wisdom does not teach the five grasping skandhas as something to be annihilated or as something not to be annihilated.🔽The Lord: The perfection of wisdom does not teach the five grasping skandhas as something to be taken up or as something not to be taken up.

original: skye zhes bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: skye zhes bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they are produced.

original: 'gag ces bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: 'gag ces bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they cease.

original: kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they are afflicted.

original: rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi ston to //🔽'phel zhes bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi ston to // 'phel zhes bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they are purified.🔽He does not teach that they increase.

original: 'grib ces bya bar mi ston to //🔽@113b blang zhes bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: 'grib ces bya bar mi ston to // @113b blang zhes bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they decrease.🔽He does not teach that they are to be adopted.

original: dor zhes bya bar mi ston to //🔽'das zhes bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: dor zhes bya bar mi ston to // 'das zhes bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they are to be rejected.🔽He does not teach that they are past.

original: ma 'ongs zhes bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: ma 'ongs zhes bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they are future.

original: da ltar byung zhes bya bar mi ston to //
analyzed: da ltar byung zhes bya bar mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach that they are present.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la 'jig pa med do /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la 'jig pa med do /
translated: Emptiness does not perish.

original: rab tu 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: rab tu 'jig pa med do //
translated: It does not utterly perish.

original: mtshan ma med pa la 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la 'jig pa med do //
translated: Signlessness does not perish.

original: rab tu 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: rab tu 'jig pa med do //
translated: It does not utterly perish.

original: smon pa med pa la 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: smon pa med pa la 'jig pa med do //
translated: Wishlessness does not perish.🔽It does not utterly perish.🔽Non-production does not perish.🔽It does not utterly perish.🔽Non-cessation does not perish.🔽It does not utterly perish.🔽Non-affliction does not perish.

original: rab tu 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: rab tu 'jig pa med do //
translated: It does not utterly perish.🔽Non-purification does not perish.🔽It does not utterly perish.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
translated: Non-existence does not perish.🔽It does not utterly perish.🔽Non-entities do not perish.

original: skye ba med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
translated: They do not utterly perish.

original: dngos po med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa la 'jig pa'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
translated: There is no destruction or complete destruction of a non-thing.

original: rang bzhin med pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa la 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa med do //
translated: There is no destruction or complete destruction of the absence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston par gsungs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston par gsungs te /
translated: Subhūti, the Tathāgata has said that the perfection of wisdom teaches the world in that way.

original: rab 'byor / sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems dang spyod pa mkhyen pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten cing rab tu mkhyen te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems dang spyod pa mkhyen pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten cing rab tu mkhyen te /
translated: Subhūti, those understandings of the thoughts and conduct of countless, innumerable, and limitless sentient beings are also known by relying on the perfection of wisdom itself.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni sems can med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni sems can med do //
translated: Subhūti, in this profound perfection of wisdom there are no sentient beings,

original: sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: and the designation of a sentient being is not apprehended.

original: gzugs med do //
analyzed: gzugs med do //
translated: There is no form,

original: gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: and the designation of form is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba med do //
analyzed: tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no feeling,

original: tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: and the designation of feeling is not apprehended.

original: 'du shes med do //
analyzed: 'du shes med do //
translated: There is no conception,

original: 'du shes su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: and the designation of conception is not apprehended.

original: 'du byed med do //
analyzed: 'du byed med do //
translated: There are no mental formations,🔽and the designation of mental formations is not apprehended.

original: 'du byed du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Formations are not apprehended.

original: rnam @114a *// par shes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam @114a *// par shes pa med do //
translated: Consciousness does not exist.

original: rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Consciousness is not apprehended.

original: mig med do //
analyzed: mig med do //
translated: The eyes do not exist.

original: mig tu gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig tu gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The eyes are not apprehended.

original: rna ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba med do //
translated: The ears do not exist.

original: rna bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The ears are not apprehended.

original: sna med do //
analyzed: sna med do //
translated: The nose does not exist.

original: snar gdags pa mi dmigs so /
analyzed: snar gdags pa mi dmigs so /
translated: The nose is not apprehended.

original: lce med do //
analyzed: lce med do //
translated: The tongue does not exist.

original: lcer gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lcer gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The tongue is not apprehended.

original: lus med do //
analyzed: lus med do //
translated: The body does not exist.

original: lus su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The body is not apprehended.

original: yid med do //
analyzed: yid med do //
translated: The mind does not exist.

original: yid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The mind is not apprehended.

original: gzugs med do //
analyzed: gzugs med do //
translated: Form does not exist.

original: gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Form is not apprehended.

original: sgra med do //
analyzed: sgra med do //
translated: Sound does not exist.

original: sgrar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sgrar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Sound is not apprehended.

original: dri med do //
analyzed: dri med do //
translated: Smell does not exist.

original: drir gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: drir gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Smell is not apprehended.

original: ro med do //
analyzed: ro med do //
translated: Taste does not exist.

original: ror gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ror gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Taste is not apprehended.

original: reg med do //
analyzed: reg med do //
translated: Touch does not exist.

original: reg tu gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: reg tu gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Touch is not apprehended.

original: chos med do //
analyzed: chos med do //
translated: Phenomena do not exist.

original: chos su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos su gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Phenomena are not apprehended.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: Eye consciousness does not exist.

original: mig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the designation of the eye consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do // rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: There is no ear consciousness.🔽The designation of the ear consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa med do // sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: There is no nose consciousness.🔽The designation of the nose consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no tongue consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of the tongue consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no body consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of the body consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no thinking-mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so //🔽@114b mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so // @114b mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do //
translated: The designation of the thinking-mind consciousness is non-apprehensible.🔽There is no eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of eye contact is non-apprehensible.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so // sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do //
translated: There is no ear contact.🔽The designation of ear contact is non-apprehensible.🔽There is no nose contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of nose contact is non-apprehensible.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do //
translated: There is no contact that is the union of tongue, tastes, and tongue consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of contact that is the union of tongue, tastes, and tongue consciousness is not apprehended.🔽There is no contact that is the union of body, tangibles, and body consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do; ;lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do; ;lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of contact that is the union of body, tangibles, and body consciousness is not apprehended.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do //
translated: There is no contact that is the union of mind, mental phenomena, and mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of contact that is the union of mind, mental phenomena, and mind consciousness is not apprehended.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the union of eye, forms, and eye consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the union of eye, forms, and eye consciousness is not apprehended.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the union of ear, sounds, and ear consciousness is not apprehended.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the union of nose, smells, and nose consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The designation of feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the union of nose, smells, and nose consciousness is not apprehended.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
translated: There is no feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the union of tongue, tastes, and tongue consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: a designation on the basis of contact through tongue-and-­body-­and-­mind contact is not apprehended.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do //

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med do // phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid med do //

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid med do // don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong @116a *// pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do //

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is not perceived.🔽The emptiness of the unlimited is not perceived.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not perceived.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not perceived.🔽The emptiness of nonrejection is not perceived.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so // rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection is not perceived.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is not perceived.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so // chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do //
translated: The emptiness of all things is not perceived.🔽The emptiness of its own mark is not perceived.

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is not perceived.🔽The emptiness of nonapprehension is not perceived.🔽The emptiness of nonapprehension is not perceived.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do //

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med do //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams med do //

analyzed: dbang po rnams med do // dbang por gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: stobs rnams med do //

analyzed: stobs su gdags pa mi dmigs so; ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnam su med do //

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa mi dmigs so //

original: bsam gtan rnams med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams med do //

original: bsam gtan du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams med do //

analyzed: tshad med par gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams med do //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du gdags pa mi dmigs so // gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do //

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgor gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams med do; ;mi 'jigs par gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig par gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: byams pa chen po med do //

analyzed: byams pa chen por gdags pa mi dmigs so // snying rje chen po med do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par gdags pa mi dmigs so //

original: thams cad shes pa nyid med do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid med do //

original: thams cad shes pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid med do //

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ston pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ston pa yin te /
translated: “Subhūti, this deep perfection of wisdom is the teaching of the world of the tathāgatas.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @117b zab mo 'di ni gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @117b zab mo 'di ni gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: This profound transcendent perfection of wisdom does not reveal physical forms.

original: tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal feelings.

original: 'du shes ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal perceptions.

original: 'du byed ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal formative predispositions.

original: rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽mig ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no // mig ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal consciousness.🔽It does not reveal the eyes.

original: rna ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽sna ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rna ba ston par byed pa ma yin no // sna ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal the ears.🔽It does not reveal the nose.

original: lce ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal the tongue.

original: lus ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽yid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus ston par byed pa ma yin no // yid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal the body.🔽It does not reveal the mental faculty.

original: gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal sights.

original: sgra ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽dri ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ston par byed pa ma yin no // dri ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal sounds.🔽It does not reveal smells.

original: ro ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽reg ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ro ston par byed pa ma yin no // reg ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal tastes.🔽It does not reveal textures.

original: chos ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal visual consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no // sna'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no // lce'i rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal auditory consciousness.🔽It does not reveal olfactory consciousness.🔽It does not reveal gustatory consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no /
translated: It does not reveal tactile consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal ear contact.🔽It does not reveal nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not reveal mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg @118a *//
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg @118a *//
translated: It does not reveal eye contact as a condition for feeling.

original: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the condition of contact at the eye is not revealed.🔽the condition of contact at the ear is not revealed.🔽the condition of contact at the nose is not revealed.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the condition of contact at the tongue is not revealed.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the condition of contact at the body is not revealed.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the condition of contact at the mind is not revealed.

original: sa'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the earth element is not revealed.

original: chu'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chu'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the water element is not revealed.

original: me'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽rlung gi khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: me'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no // rlung gi khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the fire element is not revealed.🔽the wind element is not revealed.

original: nam mkha'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the space element is not revealed.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: the consciousness element is not revealed.

original: ma rig pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach ignorance.

original: 'du byed ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach volitional forces.

original: rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach name and form.

original: skye mched drug ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye mched drug ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the six sense bases.

original: reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: reg pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach contact.

original: tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽sred pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba ston par byed pa ma yin no // sred pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach feeling.🔽It does not teach craving.

original: len pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽srid pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: len pa ston par byed pa ma yin no // srid pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach grasping.🔽It does not teach existence.

original: skye ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye ba ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach birth.

original: rga shi ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rga shi ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @118b ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @118b ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the perfection of perseverance manifest,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the perfection of concentration manifest,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa ma yin no // nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the perfection of wisdom manifest,🔽it does not make inner emptiness manifest,

original: phyi stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no // phyi nang stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make outer emptiness manifest,🔽it does not make inner and outer emptiness manifest,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the emptiness that is a non-entity manifest,

original: chen po stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the emptiness of great extent manifest,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the emptiness of ultimate reality manifest,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽'dus ma byas stong par nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no // 'dus ma byas stong par nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the emptiness of conditioned phenomena manifest,🔽it does not make the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena manifest,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not make the emptiness of the unlimited manifest,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong par nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong par nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of its own mark.🔽It does not teach the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ston par @119a *//🔽byed pa ma yin no //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ston par @119a *// byed pa ma yin no // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.🔽It does not teach the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the bases of supernatural powers.

original: dbang bo rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang bo rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the faculties.

original: stobs rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the powers.🔽They do not display the branches of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the noble truths.🔽They do not display the concentrations.

original: bsam gtan rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no; ;tshad med pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no; ;tshad med pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the formless absorptions.🔽They do not display the deliverances.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not display the successive absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, or the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no //🔽byams @119b pa chen po ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ston par byed pa ma yin no // byams @119b pa chen po ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He does not teach great love.

original: snying rje chen po ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not teach the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not display the path,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: and it does not display the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang /
analyzed: rab 'byor; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang /
translated: Subhūti, even the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la med cing mi dmigs na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la med cing mi dmigs na /
translated: is not in this deep perfection of wisdom, and is not apprehended in it,

original: gzugs yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: so how could form exist or be apprehended,

original: tshor ba yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: tshor ba yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could feeling exist or be apprehended,

original: 'du shes yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'du shes yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could perception exist or be apprehended,

original: 'du byed yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'du byed yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could volitional factors exist or be apprehended,

original: rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could consciousness exist or be apprehended,

original: mig yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /🔽rna ba yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /🔽sna yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mig yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur / rna ba yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur / sna yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the eyes exist or be apprehended,🔽how could the ears exist or be apprehended,🔽how could the nose exist or be apprehended,

original: lce yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lce yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the tongue exist or be apprehended,

original: lus yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lus yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the body be found or observed?

original: yid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: yid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the mind be found or observed?

original: gzugs yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could form be found or observed?

original: sgra yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /🔽dri yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /🔽ro yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sgra yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur / dri yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur / ro yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could sound be found or observed?🔽How could smell be found or observed?🔽How could taste be found or observed?

original: reg @120a *// yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: reg @120a *// yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could touch be found or observed?

original: chos yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: chos yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could mental phenomena be found or observed?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could eye consciousness be found or observed?

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur / sna'i rnam par shes pa yod pa 'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could ear consciousness be found or observed?🔽How could nose consciousness be found or observed?

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could tongue consciousness be found or observed?

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could body consciousness be found or observed?

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the mental consciousness be found or apprehended?

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /

analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur ////
