analyzed: dmigs su med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to //
translated: He knows them just as they are, as unapprehendable.

original: de ltar na 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phung po'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phung po'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of expansion, contraction, unfolding, and gathering is the suchness of the aggregates.

original: phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the aggregates is the suchness of the sense spheres.🔽The suchness of the sense spheres is the suchness of the elements.

original: skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni khams kyi de bzhin nyid do; ;khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni khams kyi de bzhin nyid do; ;khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the elements is the suchness of dependent origination.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of dependent origination is the suchness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of all phenomena is the suchness of the six perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the six perfections is the suchness of all emptinesses.

original: stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of all emptinesses is the suchness of the thirty-seven factors of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //🔽bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa @132a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do // bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa @132a *//
translated: The suchness of the thirty-seven factors of awakening is the suchness of the four concentrations.

original: bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the four concentrations is the suchness of the four immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the four immeasurables is the suchness of the four formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the four formless absorptions is the suchness of the five superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the five superknowledges is the suchness of the eight liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the eight liberations is the suchness of the nine serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid do; ;rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid do; ;rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The suchness of the nine serial absorptions is the suchness of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation is the suchness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas is the suchness of the four fearlessnesses.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the four fearlessnesses is the suchness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the suchness of great love.

original: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid @132b gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid @132b gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of great love is the suchness of great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of great compassion is the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is the suchness of wholesome dharmas.

original: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of wholesome dharmas is the suchness of unwholesome dharmas.

original: mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of unwholesome dharmas is the thusness of mundane dharmas.

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of mundane dharmas is the thusness of supramundane dharmas.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of supramundane dharmas is the thusness of dharmas with outflows.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of dharmas with outflows is the thusness of dharmas without outflows.

original: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of dharmas without outflows is the thusness of past, future, and present dharmas.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas dang @133a *//🔽'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas dang @133a *// 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of past, future, and present phenomena is the suchness of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena is the suchness of the fruit of entering the stream.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the fruit of entering the stream is the suchness of the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is the suchness of the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is the suchness of the fruit of arhatship.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the fruit of arhatship is the suchness of individual enlightenment.

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of individual enlightenment is the suchness of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is the suchness of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa nyid de tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa nyid de tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the tathāgatas is the suchness of a single suchness, the suchness of nondifferentiation.

original: tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mi zad pa ste /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mi zad pa ste /
translated: The suchness of nondifferentiation is inexhaustible.

original: mi zad pa'i phyir gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: mi zad pa'i phyir gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Because of being inexhaustible, it is nondual and not divided.

original: rab 'byor / de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: Subhūti, that is the suchness of all dharmas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te /
translated: The Tathāgata, having relied on this perfection of wisdom,

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: @133b rab 'byor /
analyzed: @133b rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de lta bas nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bas nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o //
translated: therefore, this deep perfection of wisdom has given birth to the Tathāgata,

original: 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o //
translated: and it has shown this world.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do //
translated: Subhūti, thus the Tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete Buddha has understood the suchness of all dharmas,

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do; ;de bzhin nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do; ;de bzhin nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
translated: has understood the unmistaken suchness, and has understood the unaltered suchness. Because of that suchness he is called the Tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete Buddha.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is so,

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste /
translated: The suchness of all phenomena, the unmistaken suchness, and the unaltered suchness are profound.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid des na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid des na /
translated: through the suchness of all phenomena, the unmistaken suchness, and the unaltered suchness,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub brjod cing smos so /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub brjod cing smos so /
translated: the blessed buddhas have expressed and described awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhig 'di la mos par 'gyur /
analyzed: slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhig 'di la mos par 'gyur /
translated: who other than irreversible bodhisattva great beings, individuals with perfect view, and arhats with exhausted defilements could possibly have conviction in this?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: the Thus-Gone One has fully awakened to these phenomena

original: sems can rnams la gsungs pa ni shin tu zab bo //
analyzed: sems can rnams la gsungs pa ni shin tu zab bo //
translated: and taught them to sentient beings. This is extremely profound.

original: bcom @134a *// ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom @134a *// ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di lta de ltar de bzhin nyid ni mi zad pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di lta de ltar de bzhin nyid ni mi zad pa ste /
translated: “Subhūti, thusness is inexhaustible.

original: de ci'i phyir mi zad ce na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir mi zad ce na /
translated: Why is it inexhaustible?

original: chos thams cad mi zad pa'i phyir te; rab 'byor /
analyzed: chos thams cad mi zad pa'i phyir te; rab 'byor /
translated: Because all phenomena are inexhaustible.

original: de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Subhūti, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sems can rnams la gsungs te /
analyzed: sems can rnams la gsungs te /
translated: taught it to sentient beings,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: saying, ‘Thus is the thusness of all phenomena.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter thirty-two.

original: de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag lha rdzas kyi tsandan gyi phye mas mngon par 'thor zhing /
analyzed: de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag lha rdzas kyi tsandan gyi phye mas mngon par 'thor zhing /
translated: Then, all the sons of gods who live in the desire realm and the form realm in this great trichiliocosm, having scattered divine sandalwood powder,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas /
translated: went to where the Blessed One was, and having arrived,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
translated: they bowed their heads at the Blessed One’s two feet

original: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
translated: and sat to one side.

original: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'dod pa ne spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'dod pa ne spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: After they had sat to one side, all the sons of gods who live in the desire realm and the form realm said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad na /
translated: when the profound perfection of wisdom is explained,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags /
translated: what are the characteristics of the profound perfection of wisdom?”🔽The Blessed One said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @134b stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @134b stsal pa /
translated: “Sons of gods,🔽the profound perfection of wisdom is characterized by emptiness.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said: What is the defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom, O Lord?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The Lord said: The defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom is emptiness.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said: What is the defining characteristic of emptiness, O Lord?

original: shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The Lord said: The defining characteristic of emptiness is the defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said: What is the defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom, O Lord?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do // lha'i bu dag /
translated: The Lord said: The defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom is the defining characteristic of emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do // lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said: What is the defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom, O Lord?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The Lord said: The defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom is the defining characteristic of emptiness.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said: What is the defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom, O Lord?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The Lord said: The defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom is the defining characteristic of emptiness.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said: What is the defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom, O Lord?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The Lord said: The defining characteristic of the perfection of wisdom is the defining characteristic of emptiness.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said, Goddess, how should we see the perfection of wisdom?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do // lha'i bu dag /
translated: The goddess said, Divine princes, you should see the perfection of wisdom as the characteristic of non-purification.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid do // lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes, you should see the perfection of wisdom as the characteristic of non-existence.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid do // lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes, you should see the perfection of wisdom as the characteristic of non-entity.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i bu dag //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do // lha'i bu dag //
translated: Divine princes, you should see the perfection of wisdom as the characteristic of the non-entityness of entities.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do // lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes, you should see the perfection of wisdom as the characteristic of non-abiding.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i @135a *// bu dag /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //🔽lha'i @135a *// bu dag /
translated: Divine princes, you should see the perfection of wisdom as the characteristic of space.🔽Divine princes, you should see the perfection of wisdom as the characteristic of non-discrimination.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' stsal te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' stsal te /
translated: “This profound perfection of wisdom, although it has such a defining characteristic, was taught by the Tathāgata as a conventional expression in the world.

original: don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not ultimately.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: mtshan nyid de dag ni lta dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de dag ni lta dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus so //
translated: those defining characteristics cannot be otherwise made by the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad de /
analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad de /
translated: The world with its gods, humans, and asuras is just those defining characteristics.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid gzhan du mi byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid gzhan du mi byed do //
translated: a defining characteristic does not make a defining characteristic otherwise.

original: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid shes par mi byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid shes par mi byed do //
translated: A defining characteristic does not make a defining characteristic known.

original: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med par shes par mi byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med par shes par mi byed do //
translated: A defining characteristic does not make a defining characteristic that is without defining characteristics known.

original: mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do //
translated: That which is without defining characteristics does not make that which is without defining characteristics known.

original: de ltar mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid yod pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka la'ang gang gis shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par byed pa de lta bu mi srid do //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid yod pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka la'ang gang gis shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par byed pa de lta bu mi srid do //
translated: Thus, in both the characteristic and the absence of characteristic, the knower, the known, and the act of knowing are impossible.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes!

original: mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽tshor bas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no // tshor bas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: Those characteristics are not produced by form.🔽They are not produced by feeling.

original: 'du shes kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not produced by perception.

original: 'du byed kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not produced by volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽khams kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin no // khams kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not produced by consciousness.🔽They are not produced by the constituents.

original: skye mched kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye mched kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not produced by the sense fields.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not produced by dependent origination.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma @135b yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma @135b yin no //
translated: They are not produced by the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not produced by the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no // nang stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the perfection of wisdom.🔽It is not conditioned by inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no; ;don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no; ;don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by great emptiness. It is not conditioned by ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by unconditioned emptiness.🔽It is not conditioned by the emptiness of intrinsic nature.🔽It is not conditioned by the emptiness of other things.🔽It is not conditioned by the emptiness of intrinsic nature of other things.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽It is not conditioned by the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽It is not conditioned by the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa @136a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa @136a *//
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of nonentities.🔽It is not conditioned by the emptiness of essential nature.

original: nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong bas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par spong bas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽dbang pos 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas 'du byas pa ma yin no // dbang pos 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the bases of spiritual power.🔽It is not created by the faculties.

original: stobs kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the truths.

original: bsam gtan gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the concentrations.

original: tshad med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by the nine serial absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not created by signlessness.

original: smon pa med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: smon pa med pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the absence of wishes.

original: mngon par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sogs 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sogs 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the dhāraṇīs.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the four kinds of exact knowledge.

original: byams pa chen pos 'du byas pa ma yin @136b no; ;snying rje chen pos 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byams pa chen pos 'du byas pa ma yin @136b no; ;snying rje chen pos 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by great loving kindness. It is not conditioned by great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.🔽It is not conditioned by the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bus 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not conditioned by the fruit of arhatship.

original: rang byang chub kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not conditioned by a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not conditioned by the knowledge of path aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: and it is not conditioned by the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: mtshan nyid de dag ni mi'am /
analyzed: mtshan nyid de dag ni mi'am /
translated: those defining marks are not human,

original: mi ma yin pa'am /🔽zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: mi ma yin pa'am / zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: nor are they nonhuman;🔽they are not with outflows,

original: zag pa med pa'am /🔽'jig rten pa'am /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'am / 'jig rten pa'am /
translated: nor are they without outflows;🔽they are not mundane,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /🔽'dus byas sam /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am / 'dus byas sam /
translated: nor are they supramundane;🔽they are not conditioned,

original: 'dus ma byas kyis ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyis ma yin te /
translated: nor are they unconditioned.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes zer na /
analyzed: la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes zer na /
translated: if someone were to ask, ‘What are the defining marks of space?’,

original: ci ste yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba yin nam /
analyzed: ci ste yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba yin nam /
translated: would that be a correct question, asked by someone who is correct?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: They replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni ma lags te /
translated: it would not be.

original: yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba ma lags so //
analyzed: yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba ma lags so //
translated: That would not be a correct question, asked by someone who is correct.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du /
translated: it is because it is unconditioned.”

original: nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: Space has no characteristics at all.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Buddha said:

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: Sons of gods!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /🔽mtshan nyid @137a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste / mtshan nyid @137a *//
translated: Whether the Tathāgatas appear or not,🔽the realm of the absence of characteristics

original: med pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du gnas so //
analyzed: med pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du gnas so //
translated: remains just as it is.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma nor bar mngon par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma nor bar mngon par sangs rgyas te /
translated: The Tathāgata, without error, has realized the realm of the absence of characteristics just as it is.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, he is called the Tathāgata.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lta'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the sons of gods in the desire realm and the form realm said to the Buddha:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: World-honored One!

original: mtshan nyid de dag mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis par 'jug cing mtshan nyid de dag la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
analyzed: mtshan nyid de dag mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis par 'jug cing mtshan nyid de dag la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
translated: Since the Thus-Gone One has fully awakened to these characteristics, his wisdom vision penetrates all phenomena without obstruction. By penetrating these characteristics, the Thus-Gone One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Buddha

original: kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad kyi chags pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad kyi chags pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: has fully awakened to this perfection of wisdom, which transcends all attachment to characteristics.

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bstan pas /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bstan pas /
translated: Having fully awakened, he has taught the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtshan nyid rnams rab tu bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid zab mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid rnams rab tu bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid zab mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One has fully awakened to the profound characteristics that he has revealed.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur te /🔽de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang @137b dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur te / de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang @137b dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: Thus, the profound perfection of wisdom is the domain of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas.🔽By practicing it, the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye ba mdzad do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye ba mdzad do //
translated: Having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they have distinguished all the characteristics.

original: 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mig gi mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mig gi mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: Thus, the characteristics of form, the characteristics of feeling, the characteristics of perception, the characteristics of formation, and the characteristics of consciousness,🔽the characteristics of the eyes, the characteristics of the ears, the characteristics of the nose,🔽the characteristics of the tongue, the characteristics of the body, the characteristics of the mind, the characteristics of form, the characteristics of sound, the characteristics of smell,

original: lce'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi mtshan nyid dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / sgra'i mtshan nyid dang / dri'i mtshan nyid dang / ro'i mtshan nyid dang / reg gi mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: lce'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi mtshan nyid dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / sgra'i mtshan nyid dang / dri'i mtshan nyid dang / ro'i mtshan nyid dang / reg gi mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the characteristics of taste, the characteristics of texture, and the characteristics of mental phenomena,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the defining characteristics of the eye consciousness, the defining characteristics of the ear consciousness, the defining characteristics of the nose consciousness, the defining characteristics of the tongue consciousness, the defining characteristics of the body consciousness, and the defining characteristics of the mind consciousness;🔽the defining characteristics of eye contact, the defining characteristics of ear contact, the defining characteristics of nose contact, the defining characteristics of tongue contact, the defining characteristics of body contact, and the defining characteristics of mind contact;

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i @138a *//
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rna ba'i @138a *//
translated: the defining characteristics of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, the defining characteristics of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact,

original: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the characteristic of the condition of contact that produces feeling, the characteristic of the condition of contact that produces feeling through the nose, the characteristic of the condition of contact that produces feeling through the tongue, the characteristic of the condition of contact that produces feeling through the body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang; chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang; chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the characteristic of the condition of contact that produces feeling through the mind, the characteristic of the earth element, the characteristic of the water element, the characteristic of the fire element, the characteristic of the wind element, the characteristic of the space element,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dang / reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dang / reg pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the defining characteristics of the consciousness element,🔽the defining characteristics of ignorance, the defining characteristics of volitional factors, the defining characteristics of consciousness, the defining characteristics of name and form, the defining characteristics of the six sense spheres, the defining characteristics of contact,

original: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sred pa'i mtshan nyid dang / len pa'i mtshan nyid dang / srid pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rga shi'i mtshan nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sred pa'i mtshan nyid dang / len pa'i mtshan nyid dang / srid pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rga shi'i mtshan nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the defining characteristics of feeling, the defining characteristics of craving, the defining characteristics of grasping, the defining characteristics of existence, the defining characteristics of birth, the defining characteristics of old age and death, the defining characteristics of the perfection of generosity, the defining characteristics of the perfection of moral discipline,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the definition of the perfection of patience, the definition of the perfection of diligence, the definition of the perfection of concentration, the definition of the perfection of wisdom, the definition of inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong @138b pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: phyi stong @138b pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the definition of outer emptiness, the definition of outer and inner emptiness, the definition of the emptiness of emptiness, the definition of great emptiness, the definition of ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the characteristic of conditioned emptiness, the characteristic of unconditioned emptiness, the characteristic of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the characteristic of the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded,🔽the characteristic of the emptiness of inherent existence, the characteristic of the emptiness of all phenomena, the characteristic of the emptiness of defining characteristics, the characteristic of the emptiness of non-observation, the characteristic of the emptiness of non-entities,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: and the characteristic of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid dang /🔽dbang po'i mtshan nyid dang / stobs kyi mtshan nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang; bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid dang / tshad med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dbang po'i mtshan nyid dang / stobs kyi mtshan nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang; bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid dang / tshad med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the defining characteristics of emptiness of inherent existence, the defining characteristics of emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings, the defining characteristics of the applications of mindfulness, the defining characteristics of the right efforts, the defining characteristics of the legs of miraculous power,🔽the defining characteristics of the faculties, the defining characteristics of the powers, the defining characteristics of the branches of awakening, the defining characteristics of the noble eightfold path, the defining characteristics of the noble truths, the defining characteristics of the concentrations, the defining characteristics of the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang / mthar gyis @139a *//
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang / mthar gyis @139a *//
translated: the defining characteristics of the formless absorptions, the defining characteristics of the eight deliverances, the defining characteristics of the sequential meditative attainment,

original: gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the characteristics of meditative stabilization,🔽the characteristics of the dhāraṇī gateway,🔽the characteristics of the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽the characteristics of the four fearlessnesses,🔽the characteristics of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i mtshan nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dang / snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i mtshan nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid dang / byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dang / snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the characteristics of great love,🔽and the characteristics of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: the characteristics of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the characteristics of the result of stream enterer, the characteristics of the result of once-returner, the characteristics of the result of non-returner, the characteristics of the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: the characteristics of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, the characteristics of the knowledge of path aspects, and the characteristics of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord having said that, he said to the gods living in the desire realm and the gods living in the form realm:

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Gods,

original: gzugs ni gzhig tu rung ba'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: gzugs ni gzhig tu rung ba'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: form has the defining characteristic of being destructible.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs @139b rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs @139b rgyas so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One has fully and perfectly awakened to the absence of characteristics of the aggregates.

original: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid do /
analyzed: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid do /
translated: “Feeling has the characteristic of experience.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One has fully and perfectly awakened to the absence of characteristics of feeling.

original: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: “Perception has the characteristic of apprehending.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One has fully and perfectly awakened to the absence of characteristics of perception.

original: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: “Formation has the characteristic of formation.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One has fully and perfectly awakened to the absence of characteristics of formation.

original: rnam par shes pa ni so so'i bye brag shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni so so'i bye brag shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: “Consciousness has the characteristic of individual awareness.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One has fully and perfectly awakened to the absence of characteristics of consciousness.

original: phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: “The aggregates have the characteristic of suffering.

original: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Tathagata has fully and perfectly realized that they are without defining characteristics.

original: khams rnams mi gdug pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: khams rnams mi gdug pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The elements have the defining characteristic of being uncontaminated.

original: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One has fully and perfectly awakened to it as being without characteristics.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dag ni mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dag ni mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid de /

analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de /

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid de /

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'grel pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'grel pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The wishless gate of liberation has the characteristic of liberation.🔽The Tathāgata has fully and perfectly realized it to be without a characteristic.🔽The eight liberations have the characteristic of complete certainty.

original: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: stobs rnams ni shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i mtshan nyid de /

original: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid de /

analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yongs su mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid de /

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: btang snyoms chen po ni ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid de /

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
