translated: and without a seer,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
translated: how is it that the perfection of wisdom gives birth to the Tathāgata

original: 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags /
translated: and shows this world?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are without a knower and without a seer.

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni stong pa gsog gsob dbang med pa snying po med pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni stong pa gsog gsob dbang med pa snying po med pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are empty, hollow, insubstantial, and without a core.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason

original: chos thams cad ni shes pa bo med cing mthong ba po med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni shes pa bo med cing mthong ba po med pa'o //
translated: all phenomena are without a knower and without a seer.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, all phenomena are without a knower and without a seer.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: Subhūti,

original: chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa yin zhe na /
translated: how is it that all dharmas are without a knower and without a seer?

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni mi gnas shing khongs su chud pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni mi gnas shing khongs su chud pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all dharmas are not located and are not included.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations

original: chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste /
translated: all dharmas are without a knower and without a seer.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, thus the perfection of wisdom gives birth to the Tathāgatas and shows the world.

original: de'ang gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It shows by the nonseeing of form.

original: tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽'du shes @143a *//🔽mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // 'du shes @143a *// mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It shows by the nonseeing of feeling.🔽It shows by the nonseeing of perception.

original: 'du byed mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It shows by the nonseeing of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽mig mthong pa med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // mig mthong pa med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It shows by the nonseeing of consciousness.🔽It shows by the nonseeing of the eyes.

original: rna ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It shows by the nonseeing of the ears.

original: sna mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sna mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The nose is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: lce mthong ba med pa'i phyir spa'o //
analyzed: lce mthong ba med pa'i phyir spa'o //
translated: The tongue is the teacher because it is not seen.🔽The body is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: lus mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;yid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lus mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;yid mthong ba pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The mind is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Form is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: sgra mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽dri mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽ro mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sgra mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // dri mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // ro mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Sound is the teacher because it is not seen.🔽Smell is the teacher because it is not seen.🔽Taste is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: reg mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: reg mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Touch is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: chos mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Phenomena are the teacher because they are not seen.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Eye consciousness is the teacher because it is not seen.🔽Ear consciousness is the teacher because it is not seen.🔽Nose consciousness is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Tongue consciousness is the teacher because it is not seen.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because the consciousness of the body is not seen, it is taught;

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because the mental consciousness is not seen, it is taught.🔽because eye contact is not seen, it is taught;

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because ear contact is not seen, it is taught;🔽because nose contact is not seen, it is taught;

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because tongue contact is not seen, it is taught;

original: lus kyi 'dus @143b te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus @143b te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because body contact is not seen, it is taught;

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because mind contact is not seen, it is taught.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because feeling conditioned by eye contact is not seen, it is taught; because feeling conditioned by ear contact is not seen, it is taught;

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is compounded by the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is compounded by the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽sa'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // sa'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is compounded by the intellect.🔽He teaches because he does not see the earth element.

original: chu'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see the water element.

original: me'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽rlung gi khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // rlung gi khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see the fire element.🔽He teaches because he does not see the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see the space element.🔽He teaches because he does not see the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He teaches because he does not see ignorance.

original: 'du byed mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of volitional formations.

original: rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽skye mched drug mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // skye mched drug mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of name-and-form.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the six sense-fields.

original: reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of contact.

original: tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽sred pa mthong ba @144a *//🔽med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // sred pa mthong ba @144a *// med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of feeling.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of craving.

original: len pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽srid pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: len pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // srid pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of clinging.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of becoming.

original: skye ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of birth.

original: rga shi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // nang stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the perfection of wisdom.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: @144b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: @144b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of all things.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the applications of mindfulness.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽dbang po rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // dbang po rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the bases of supernatural power.🔽He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-apprehension of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilities are revealed because they are not seen.

original: tshad med pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The immeasurables are revealed because they are not seen.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The formless meditative stabilizations are revealed because they are not seen.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston @145a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston @145a *//
translated: The eight deliverances are revealed because they are not seen.

original: pa'o // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The nine serial absorptions are revealed because they are not seen.

original: stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽mtshan ma med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // mtshan ma med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is revealed because it is not seen.🔽Signlessness is revealed because it is not seen.

original: smon pa med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Wishlessness is revealed because it is not seen.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The clairvoyances are revealed because they are not seen.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are revealed because they are not seen.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are revealed because they are not seen.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;mi 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;mi 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of the four grounds of self-confidence.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o /
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of the four analytical knowledges.🔽He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of great love.

original: byams pa chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;snying rje chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;snying rje chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddhas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of the fruit of the oncereturner.🔽He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of the fruit of the nonreturner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of the fruit of the saint.

original: rang byang chub mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the Teacher because of the non-perception of individual enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the teacher because of the non-seeing of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @145b nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @145b nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the teacher because of the non-seeing of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, thus the perfection of wisdom generates the Tathāgata and teaches the world.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord:

original: ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that it teaches because of the non-seeing of form?🔽How is it that it teaches because of the non-seeing of feeling?

original: ji ltar na 'du shes mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'du shes mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that it teaches because of the non-seeing of perception?

original: ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that it teaches because of the non-seeing of volitional factors?

original: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that it teaches because of the non-seeing of consciousness?

analyzed: ji ltar na mig mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that it teaches because of the non-seeing of the eyes?

original: ji ltar na rna ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na sna mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rna ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na sna mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that the ears are not seen?🔽How is it that you teach that the nose is not seen?

original: ji ltar na lce mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lce mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that the tongue is not seen?

original: ji ltar na lus mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lus mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that the body is not seen?

original: ji ltar na yid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na yid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that the mind is not seen?

original: ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that forms are not seen?

analyzed: ji ltar na sgra mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na dri mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na ro mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that sounds are not seen?🔽How is it that you teach that smells are not seen?🔽How is it that you teach that tastes are not seen?

original: ji ltar na reg mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na reg mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that textures are not seen?

original: ji ltar na chos mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that dharmas are not seen?

original: ji ltar na mig gi rnam par @146a *//
analyzed: ji ltar na mig gi rnam par @146a *//
translated: How is it that the eyes🔽

original: shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that the eye consciousness is not seen?🔽How is it that you teach that the ear consciousness is not seen?🔽How is it that you teach that the nose consciousness is not seen?

original: ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that the tongue consciousness is not seen?

original: ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach that the mind consciousness is not seen?🔽How is it that you teach that eye contact is not seen?

analyzed: ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the composite of contact through the tongue is not seen?

original: ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the composite of contact through the body is not seen?

original: ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the composite of contact through the mind is not seen?

original: ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact through the eye is not seen?🔽In what way does he teach that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact through the ear is not seen?

original: ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i @146b slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i @146b slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact through the nose is not seen?

original: ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is visually compounded is not seen?

original: ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na sa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the earth element is not seen?

original: ji ltar na chu'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na chu'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the water element is not seen?

original: ji ltar na me'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rlung gi khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na me'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na rlung gi khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the fire element is not seen?🔽In what way does he teach that the wind element is not seen?

original: ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the element of consciousness is not seen?

original: ji ltar na ma rig pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na ma rig pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that ignorance is not seen?

original: ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that volitional factors are not seen?

original: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that consciousness is not seen?

original: ji ltar na ming dang gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na ming dang gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that name and form are not seen?

original: ji ltar na skye mched drug mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na skye mched drug mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the six sense spheres are not seen?

original: ji ltar na reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that contact is not seen?

original: ji ltar na tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that feeling is not seen?

original: ji ltar na sred pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i @147a *//🔽slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sred pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i @147a *//🔽slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that craving is not seen?🔽In what way does he teach that grasping is not seen?

original: ji ltar na len pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na srid pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na len pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na srid pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na skye ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na skye ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na rga shi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rga shi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach because of not seeing the perfection of morality?🔽How is it that you teach because of not seeing the perfection of patience?

analyzed: ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach because of not seeing the perfection of perseverance?

original: ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the perfection of meditative stability as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the perfection of wisdom as not seeing?🔽In what way does he teach inner emptiness as not seeing?

analyzed: ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach great emptiness as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad @147b du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad @147b du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the emptiness of ultimate reality as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is not seen?

original: ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /

original: ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not seen?🔽In what way does he teach that the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not seen?

original: ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of inherent existence is not seen?

original: ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of all phenomena is not seen?

original: ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of defining characteristics is not seen?

original: ji ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of non-apprehension is not seen?

original: ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of non-entities is not seen?🔽In what way does he teach that the emptiness of essential nature is not seen?

original: ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not seen?

original: ji ltar na dran pa nya bar bzhag pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa slad du ston pa @148a *//
analyzed: ji ltar na dran pa nya bar bzhag pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa slad du ston pa @148a *//
translated: In what way does he teach that the applications of mindfulness are not seen?🔽In what way does he teach that the right efforts are not seen?🔽In what way does he teach that the legs of manifestation are not seen?

original: lags / ji ltar na dbang po rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: lags / ji ltar na dbang po rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach that the faculties are not seen?

original: ji ltar na stobs rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na stobs rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the powers as not being seen?🔽In what way does he teach the aspects of the path as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the limbs of awakening as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the noble eightfold path as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the noble truths as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na bsam gtan rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na bsam gtan rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the meditative stabilities as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na tshad med pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na tshad med pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the immeasurable aspirations as not being seen?🔽In what way does he teach the formless absorptions as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags; ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags; ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the eight deliverances as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the nine serial absorptions as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach emptiness as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach signlessness as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na smon pa med pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na smon pa med pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach wishlessness as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the clairvoyances as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba @148b ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba @148b ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the meditative stabilizations as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the dhāraṇī gateways as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the ten tathāgata powers as not being seen?

original: ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the four fearlessnesses as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na byams pa chen po mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na byams pa chen po mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the detailed and thorough knowledges as not seeing?🔽In what way does he teach great love as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na snying rje chen po mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na snying rje chen po mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach great compassion as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /🔽ji ltar na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags / ji ltar na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the eighteen special qualities of buddhas as not seeing?🔽In what way does he teach the result of stream enterer as not seeing?🔽In what way does he teach the result of once-returner as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: In what way does he teach the result of non-returner as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the state of a worthy one as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na rang byang chub mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang byang chub mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach individual enlightenment as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the knowledge of path aspects as not seeing?

original: ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags /
translated: How is it that you teach the knowledge of all aspects as not seeing?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / nam gzugs la dmigs @149a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / nam gzugs la dmigs @149a *//
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: “Su­bhūti, when consciousness that perceives physical forms does not occur,

original: gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is taught that physical forms are not seen.

original: nam tshor ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe; tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: nam tshor ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe; tshor ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: When consciousness that perceives feelings does not occur, it is taught that feelings are not seen.

original: nam 'du shes la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam 'du shes la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives perceptions does not occur,

original: 'du shes mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the teacher because of the non-perception of the perception of conceptualization.

original: nam 'du byed la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam 'du byed la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise in relation to conceptualization,

original: 'du byed mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the teacher because of the non-perception of conceptualization.

original: nam rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise in relation to consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the teacher because of the non-perception of consciousness.

original: nam mig la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mig la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise in relation to the eye,

original: mig mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mig mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the teacher because of the non-perception of the eye.

original: nam rna ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rna ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise in relation to the ear,

original: rna ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the teacher because of the non-perception of the ear.

original: nam sna la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam sna la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise in relation to the nose,

original: sna mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sna mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the teacher because of the non-perception of the nose.

original: nam lce la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam lce la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise in relation to the tongue,

original: lce mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lce mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the teacher because of the non-perception of the tongue.

original: nam lus la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam lus la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the body does not arise,

original: lus mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lus mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the body is not seen and is therefore taught.

original: nam yid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam yid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the mind does not arise,

original: yid la mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: yid la mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the mind is not seen and is therefore taught.

original: nam gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes @149b pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes @149b pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives form does not arise,

original: gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: form is not seen and is therefore taught.🔽When the consciousness that perceives sound does not arise,

original: nam sgra la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe sgra mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: nam sgra la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe sgra mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: sound is not seen and is therefore taught.

original: nam dri la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam dri la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives smell does not arise,

original: dri mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dri mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: smell is not seen and is therefore taught.

original: nam ro la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam ro la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives taste does not arise,🔽taste is not seen and is therefore taught.

original: ro mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;nam reg la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: ro mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o; ;nam reg la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives touch does not arise,

analyzed: reg mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the Teacher because it is not touched or seen.

original: nam chos la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam chos la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise with respect to the objective realm,

original: chos mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the Teacher because the objective realm is not seen.

original: nam mig gi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mig gi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the Teacher because the consciousness of the eye is not seen.

original: nam rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the Teacher because the consciousness of the ear is not seen.

original: nam sna'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam sna'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise with respect to the consciousness of the nose,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the Teacher because the consciousness of the nose is not seen.

original: nam lce'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam lce'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness does not arise with respect to the consciousness of the tongue,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The tongue consciousness is revealed because the seeing of the tongue consciousness does not occur.

original: nam lus kyi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam lus kyi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the body consciousness does not occur,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir @150a *//
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir @150a *//
translated: the body consciousness is revealed because the seeing of the body consciousness does not occur.

original: ston pa'o // nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: ston pa'o // nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the mind consciousness is revealed because the seeing of the mind consciousness does not occur.

analyzed: nam mig gi 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: eye contact is revealed because the seeing of eye contact does not occur.

original: nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: ear contact is revealed because the seeing of ear contact does not occur.

original: nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

analyzed: nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

analyzed: nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that observes the contact of the mind does not arise,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

analyzed: nam phyi stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

analyzed: nam phyi nang stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

original: nam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

original: nam chen po stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam chen po stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of the great is not seen, and so it is the teacher.

original: nam don dam pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam don dam pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that observes the emptiness of the ultimate is not produced,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate is not seen, and so it is the teacher.

original: nam 'dus byas stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam 'dus byas stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that observes the emptiness of the compounded is not produced,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of the compounded is not seen, and so it is the teacher.

original: nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la @152b dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la @152b dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that observes the emptiness of the uncompounded is not produced,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of the uncompounded is not seen, and so it is the teacher.

original: nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that focuses on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes does not occur,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is shown because it is not seen.

original: nam thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that focuses on the emptiness of what is without beginning or end does not occur,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

original: nam dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that focuses on the emptiness of what is not to be discarded does not occur,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is shown because it is not seen.

original: nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that focuses on the emptiness of nature does not occur,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the emptiness of nature is shown because it is not seen.

original: nam chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that observes the emptiness of all phenomena does not occur,

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //

analyzed: nam rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that observes the emptiness of its own characteristics does not occur,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is taught because the emptiness of its own characteristics is not seen.

original: nam mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that observes the emptiness of non-observation does not occur,

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
