original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the Teacher because the emptiness of essential nature is not seen.

original: nam dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽nam dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // nam dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: It is the Teacher because the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is not seen when consciousness that observes the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence does not arise.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the Teacher because the applications of mindfulness are not seen when consciousness that observes the applications of mindfulness does not arise.

original: nam yang dag par spong ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //🔽nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam yang dag par spong ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe / yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o // nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: It is the Teacher because the right efforts are not seen when consciousness that observes the right efforts does not arise.🔽It is the Teacher because the legs of manifestation are not seen when consciousness that observes the legs of manifestation does not arise.🔽It is the Teacher because the faculties are not seen when consciousness that observes the faculties does not arise.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the Teacher because the powers are not seen when consciousness that observes the powers does not arise.🔽It is the Teacher because the limbs of awakening are not seen when consciousness that observes the limbs of awakening does not arise.🔽It is the Teacher because the path is not seen when consciousness that observes the path does not arise.

original: nam dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the faculties does not arise,

original: dbang po rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the faculties are shown because they are not seen.

original: nam stobs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam stobs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the powers does not arise,

original: stobs rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the powers are shown because they are not seen.

original: nam byang chub kyi yan lag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam byang chub kyi yan lag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the branches of enlightenment does not arise,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir @153b ston pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir @153b ston pa'o //
translated: the branches of enlightenment are shown because they are not seen.

original: nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the noble eightfold path does not arise,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the noble eightfold path is shown because it is not seen.

original: nam 'phags pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam 'phags pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the truths of the noble ones does not arise,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the truths of the noble ones are shown because they are not seen.

original: nam bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the meditative concentrations does not occur,

original: bsam gtan rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the meditative concentrations are revealed because they are not perceived.

original: nam tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the immeasurables does not occur,

original: tshad med pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the immeasurables are revealed because they are not perceived.

original: nam gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the formless meditative stabilizations does not occur,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations are revealed because they are not perceived.

original: nam rnam par thar pa brgyad la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rnam par thar pa brgyad la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the eight deliverances does not occur,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: the eight deliverances are revealed because they are not perceived.

original: nam mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When the consciousness that perceives the nine serial meditative stabilizations does not occur,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because of the non-perception of the nine serial absorptions.

original: nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @154a *//
analyzed: nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @154a *//
translated: When consciousness that perceives the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors of liberation does not occur,

original: nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: he is the teacher because of the non-perception of the emptiness, signless, and wishless doors of liberation.

original: nam mngon par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mngon par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives the superknowledges does not occur,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: he is the teacher because of the non-perception of the superknowledges.

original: nam ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives the meditative stabilizations does not occur,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: he is the teacher because of the non-perception of the meditative stabilizations.

original: nam gzungs kyi sgo la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam gzungs kyi sgo la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives the dhāraṇī gateways does not occur,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because the dhāraṇī gateways are not seen.

original: nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives the ten powers of the tathāgatas does not occur,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: he is the teacher because the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not seen.

original: nam mi 'jigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mi 'jigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives the fearlessnesses does not occur,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: he is the teacher because the fearlessnesses are not seen.

original: nam so so yang dag par rig pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam so so yang dag par rig pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives the detailed and thorough knowledges does not occur,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: he is the teacher because the detailed and thorough knowledges are not seen.

original: nam byams pa chen po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam byams pa chen po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives great love does not occur,

original: byams pa chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: he is the teacher because great love is not seen.

original: nam snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that perceives great compassion does not occur,

original: snying rje chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: It is the Teacher because great compassion is not seen.

original: @154b nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: @154b nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that takes the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha as its object does not occur,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the Teacher because the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha are not seen.

original: nam rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that takes the fruit of stream enterer as its object does not occur,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the Teacher because the fruit of stream enterer is not seen.

original: nam lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that takes the fruit of once-returner as its object does not occur,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: it is the Teacher because the fruit of once-returner is not seen.

original: nam phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that takes the fruit of non-returner as its object does not occur,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: Because the fruit of non-returning is not seen, it is shown.

original: nam dgra bcom pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam dgra bcom pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that focuses on the state of a worthy one does not occur,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because the state of a worthy one is not seen, it is shown.

original: nam rang byang chub la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung pa'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rang byang chub la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung pa'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that focuses on a pratyekabuddha’s awakening does not occur,

original: rang byang chub mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on the knowledge of path aspects does not occur,🔽because the knowledge of path aspects is not seen, it is shown.

original: nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe //
analyzed: nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe //
translated: When consciousness that focuses on the knowledge of all aspects does not occur,🔽because the knowledge of all aspects is not seen, it is shown.”🔽“Subhūti, when consciousness that focuses on form does not occur,🔽because form is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on feeling does not occur,🔽because feeling is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on perception does not occur,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because perception is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on volitional factors does not occur,🔽because volitional factors are not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on consciousness does not occur,🔽because consciousness is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on the eyes does not occur,🔽because the eyes are not seen, it is shown.

original: nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
analyzed: nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe /
translated: When consciousness that focuses on the ears does not occur,🔽because the ears are not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on the nose does not occur,🔽because the nose is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on the tongue does not occur,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: because the tongue is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on the body does not occur,🔽because the body is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on the thinking-mind does not occur,🔽because the thinking-mind is not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on sights does not occur,🔽because sights are not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on sounds does not occur,🔽because sounds are not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on smells does not occur,🔽because smells are not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on tastes does not occur,🔽because tastes are not seen, it is shown.🔽When consciousness that focuses on tangibles

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de @155a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de @155a *//
translated: In this way, Subhūti, this profound perfection of wisdom

original: bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
analyzed: bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
translated: generates the Tathāgata

original: 'jig rten ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten ston pa'o //
translated: and shows the world.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, how does this perfection of wisdom generate the Tathāgata and show the world?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa zhes brjod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa zhes brjod de /
translated: Subhūti, here the perfection of wisdom is called “emptiness” in the world.

original: 'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes brjod ce na /
translated: What is called “emptiness” in the world?

original: gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //🔽tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do // tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: Form is called “empty” in the world.🔽Feeling is called “empty” in the world.

original: 'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: 'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: Perception is called “empty” in the world.

original: 'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: 'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: Formations are called “empty” in the world.

original: rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: Consciousness is called “empty” in the world.

original: mig stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: mig stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “The eye is empty” is said in the world.

original: rna ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //🔽sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: rna ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do // sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “The ear is empty” is said in the world.🔽“The nose is empty” is said in the world.

original: lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “The tongue is empty” is said in the world.

original: lus stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: lus stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “The body is empty” is said in the world.

original: yid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: yid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “The mind is empty” is said in the world.

original: gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //🔽sgra stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do // sgra stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Form is empty” is said in the world.🔽“Sound is empty” is said in the world.

original: dri stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //🔽ro stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: dri stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do // ro stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Smell is empty” is said in the world.🔽“Taste is empty” is said in the world.

original: reg stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: reg stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Touch is empty” is said in the world.

original: chos stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: chos stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Dharmas are empty” is said in the world.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo @155b zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo @155b zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Eye consciousness is empty” is said in the world.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do // sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Ear consciousness is empty,” it is said in the world.🔽“Nose consciousness is empty,” it is said in the world.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Tongue consciousness is empty,” it is said in the world.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //
translated: “Body consciousness is empty,” it is said in the world.

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do //

original: 'jig rten na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to //🔽'jig rten na dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'jig rten na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to // 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: in the world, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is taught to be empty.🔽in the world, arhatship is taught to be empty.

original: 'jig rten na rang byang chub stong zhes bya bar ston to //🔽'jig rten na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'jig rten na rang byang chub stong zhes bya bar ston to // 'jig rten na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: in the world, individual enlightenment is taught to be empty.🔽in the world, the knowledge of path aspects is taught to be empty.

original: 'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: in the world, the knowledge of all aspects is taught to be empty.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom gives birth to the Tathāgata

original: 'jig rten ston pa'o ////
analyzed: 'jig rten ston pa'o ////
translated: and shows the world.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya bcu gnyis pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya bcu gnyis pa //
translated: Fascicle Twenty-Two

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom shows the Tathāgata that the world is inconceivable.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston ce na /🔽gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi @161a *//
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston ce na / gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi @161a *//
translated: How does it show that the world is inconceivable?

original: khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: khyab ces bya bar ston to // tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows that the world of form is inconceivable.🔽It shows that the world of feeling is inconceivable.

original: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows that the world of perception is inconceivable. It shows that the world of mental formations is inconceivable.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of consciousness is inconceivable.

original: mig gi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // sna'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the eye is inconceivable.🔽the world of the ear is inconceivable.🔽the world of the nose is inconceivable.

original: lce'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the tongue is inconceivable.

original: lus kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the body is inconceivable.

original: yid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the mind is inconceivable.

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽sgra'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽dri'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // sgra'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // dri'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of form is inconceivable.🔽the world of sound is inconceivable.🔽the world of smell is inconceivable.

original: ro'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ro'i 'jig rten bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of taste is inconceivable.

original: reg gi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg gi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of contact is inconceivable.

original: chos kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mental phenomena is inconceivable.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten @161b bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten @161b bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of eye consciousness is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of ear consciousness is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of nose consciousness is inconceivable.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of tongue consciousness is inconceivable.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of body consciousness is inconceivable.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mind consciousness is inconceivable.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of eye contact is inconceivable.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the coming together of ear contact is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of the coming together of nose contact is inconceivable.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the coming together of tongue contact is inconceivable.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the coming together of body contact is inconceivable.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the coming together of mind contact is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of the experience of contact through the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of the experience of contact through the coming together of ear, sound, and consciousness is inconceivable.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the experience of contact through the coming together of nose, smell, and consciousness is inconceivable.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the tongue as a condition is inconceivable.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the body as a condition is inconceivable.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces @162a *//🔽bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces @162a *// bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the mind as a condition is inconceivable.

original: sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the earth element is inconceivable.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the water element is inconceivable.

original: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the fire element is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of the wind element is inconceivable.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the space element is inconceivable.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of the consciousness element to be inconceivable.

original: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of ignorance to be inconceivable.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of volitional factors to be inconceivable.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of consciousness to be inconceivable.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of name-and-form to be inconceivable.

original: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of the six sense spheres to be inconceivable.

original: reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of contact to be inconceivable. He reveals the world of feeling to be inconceivable.

original: sred pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sred pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world of craving to be inconceivable.

original: len pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;srid pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: len pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;srid pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of existence is inconceivable.

original: skye ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of birth is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of old age and death is inconceivable.

original: rga shi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston @162b to; ;sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston @162b to; ;sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of generosity is inconceivable.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of moral discipline is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of the perfection of patience is inconceivable.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of perseverance is inconceivable.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of concentration is inconceivable.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the perfection of wisdom.🔽He teaches the inconceivability of the world of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the emptiness of the compounded.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the unconditioned is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is inconceivable.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam @163a *//🔽gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam @163a *// gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what is without beginning and end is inconceivable.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of non-rejection is inconceivable.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of nature is inconceivable.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of all phenomena is inconceivable.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of specific characteristics is inconceivable.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of non-apprehension is inconceivable.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the emptiness of non-things.🔽He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the right efforts.🔽He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the bases of supernatural power.

original: dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to; ;stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the faculties. He teaches the inconceivability of the world of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the limbs of enlightenment is inconceivable.

original: 'phags pa'i @163b lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i @163b lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eightfold noble path is inconceivable.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the noble truths is inconceivable.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the meditative stabilities is inconceivable.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the immeasurables is inconceivable.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the formless meditative absorptions is inconceivable.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eight deliverances is inconceivable.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the nine serial absorptions is inconceivable.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation is inconceivable.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the superknowledges is inconceivable.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the meditative stabilizations is inconceivable.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the dhāraṇī gateways is inconceivable.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the ten tathāgata powers is inconceivable.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the four fearlessnesses is inconceivable.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis @164a *//
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis @164a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is inconceivable.

original: mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of great loving kindness is inconceivable.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: he reveals the inconceivability of the world of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: he reveals the inconceivability of the world of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: he reveals the inconceivability of the world of the result of stream enterer.🔽he reveals the inconceivability of the world of the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: he reveals the inconceivability of the world of the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: he reveals the inconceivability of the world of the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: he reveals the inconceivability of the world of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: he reveals the inconceivability of the world of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows the inconceivability of the world of the knowledge of all modes.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, this deep perfection of wisdom shows to the Tathagata the world as void.

original: 'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na /🔽gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na / gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: How does it show the world as void?🔽 It shows the world of form as void.🔽 It shows the world of feeling as void.🔽 It shows the world of perception as void.

original: tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows the world of the will to action as void.

original: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows the world of consciousness as void.🔽 It shows the world of the eye as void.🔽 It shows the world of the ear as void.🔽 It shows the world of the nose as void.🔽 It shows the world of the tongue as void.🔽 It shows the world of the body as void.🔽 It shows the world of the mind as void.🔽 It shows the world of form as void.🔽 It shows the world of sound as void.🔽 It shows the world of smell as void.🔽 It shows the world of taste as void.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows the world of the tangible as void.🔽 It shows the world of dharmas as void.🔽 It shows the world of the eye element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the eye-consciousness element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the eye-contact element as void.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston @164b to; ;mig gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston @164b to; ;mig gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows the world of the feeling which arises from the condition of eye-contact as void.🔽 It shows the world of the ear element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the ear-consciousness element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the ear-contact element as void.

original: sna'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows the world of the feeling which arises from the condition of ear-contact as void.🔽 It shows the world of the nose element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the nose-consciousness element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the nose-contact element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the feeling which arises from the condition of nose-contact as void.🔽 It shows the world of the tongue element as void.🔽 It shows the world of the tongue-consciousness element as void.🔽 It shows the world of

original: lce'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;lus kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;lus kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue is void. He teaches that the world of the body is void.

original: yid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the mind is void.

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of form is void.

original: sgra'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;dri'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sgra'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;dri'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of sound is void. He teaches that the world of smell is void.

original: ro'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽reg gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ro'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // reg gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of taste is void.🔽He teaches that the world of touch is void.

original: chos kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mental objects is void.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of eye consciousness is void.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shas pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shas pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ear consciousness is void.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of nose consciousness is void. He teaches that the world of tongue consciousness is void.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body consciousness is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the mind consciousness is void.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of eye contact is void.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ear contact is void.🔽He teaches that the world of nose contact is void.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of tongue contact is void.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of body contact is void.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya @165a *//🔽bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya @165a *// bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mind contact is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is void.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is void.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the nose as its condition is void.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the tongue as its condition is void.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the body as its condition is void.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the mind as its condition is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the earth element is void.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the water element is void.

original: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the fire element is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the wind element is void.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the space element is void.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the consciousness element is void.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of volitional factors is void.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of consciousness is void.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of name-and-form is void.

original: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the six sense spheres is void.

original: reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of contact is void.

original: tshor ba'i 'jig rten @165b dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'jig rten @165b dben zhes bya bar ston to // sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling is void.🔽He teaches that the world of craving is void.

original: len pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: len pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of clinging is void.🔽He teaches that the world of existence is void.

original: skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of birth is void.

original: rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of old age and death is void.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the perfection of generosity is the world’s emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the perfection of moral discipline is the world’s emptiness.🔽He teaches that the perfection of patience is the world’s emptiness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the perfection of perseverance is the world’s emptiness.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the perfection of concentration is the world’s emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the perfection of wisdom is the world’s emptiness.🔽He teaches that inner emptiness is the world’s emptiness.🔽He teaches that outer emptiness is the world’s emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that outer and inner emptiness is the world’s emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of emptiness is void.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the great is void.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the ultimate is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the conditioned is void.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the unconditioned is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is void.

original: thog @166a *// ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: thog @166a *// ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is void.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of non-rejection is void.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of nature is void.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of all phenomena is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of its own mark is void.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of non-apprehension is void.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of non-existence is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of own-being is void.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being is void.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the applications of mindfulness is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the right efforts is void.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the bases of supernatural power is void.

original: dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the faculties is void.

original: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the powers is void.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the branches of enlightenment is void.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the noble eightfold path is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the noble truths is void.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten @166b dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten @166b dben zhes bya bar ston to // tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the concentrations is void.🔽He teaches that the world of the immeasurables is void.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the formless absorptions is void.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eight deliverances is void.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the nine serial absorptions is void.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the superknowledges are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the meditative stabilizations are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the dhāraṇī gateways are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the tathāgata powers are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the fearlessnesses are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that great love is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that great compassion is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha are empty of the world.🔽He teaches that the result of stream-enterer is empty of the world.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the result of once-returner is empty of the world.
